Vote - AcceptText - The correction to Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) in lines 2 and 29 has already been proposed in P.Fay. 81 introd. (p. 209), which should replace "PN N. Reggiani ...". This resolution is generally accepted (e.g. SB XXII 15707.5 ) Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) means still remains debatable; contrast ZPE 99 (1993) 73 n. 2 with P.Louvre I 43.11 n. || lin4 ought to be Î¦Î¹Î»Î±Î´Î­Î»Ï†[Î¿Ï…] || lin5 |reg| does not display well. â€” Voting now to move things ahead.

Submit - Fixed the BL addition of ll. 1-7 and updated the line numbering accordingly. The correct reference for the reading of ll. 1-7, which were left untranscribed by the ed.pr., is to BL 2.2, p. 80 (= Hombert, Aeg. 3, 1922, 354) and not to BL 1, p. 249.
Regularized iotacism at ll. 8, 18, 28.
Corrected the abbreviation for Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) at ll. 9 & 29 according to parallel sitologos-receipts (e.g. P.Louvre 1.43). The phrase á½‘Ï€á½²Ï Î´Î·Î¼Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½ commonly points to one of the two main rent categories dealt with by the sitologoi: see also e.g. P.Tebt.2.368,5 á½‘Ï€á½²Ï Î´[Î·(Î¼Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) Ï„á¿†Ï‚] Î±á½Ï„á¿†Ï‚ ÎºÏ(Î¼Î·Ï‚); SB 20.14682,3 (á½‘Ï€á½²Ï) Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) Ï„á¿†(Ï‚) Ï€ÏŒÎ»Ì£(ÎµÏ‰Ï‚). The other rent categort is á½‘Ï€á½²Ï ÎºÎ±Ï„Î¿Î¯ÎºÏ‰Î½, cf. e.g. SB 16.12684,8-9 á½‘Ï€(á½²Ï) [á¼œ]Î¾Ï‰ Î¨ÎµÌ£á¿¦Ì£ÏÌ£ ÎºÎ±Ï„Ì£Î¿Î¯Ì£ÎºÌ£(Ï‰Î½).In the administrative terminology they are regularly expressed in the genitive plural.
Vote - ReturnToSender - This cannot be accepted without a more detailed explanation why the genitive plural is to be preferred.
Vote - ReturnToSender - The word order seems to be impossible, cf. the given examples.

entered correct form Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) at ll. 2 & 22 from comparison with other similar documents (see e.g. P.Tebt.2.368,5 á½‘Ï€á½²Ï Î´[Î·(Î¼Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) Ï„á¿†Ï‚] Î±á½Ï„á¿†Ï‚ ÎºÏ(Î¼Î·Ï‚); SB 20.14682,3 (á½‘Ï€á½²Ï) Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½) Ï„á¿†(Ï‚) Ï€ÏŒÎ»Ì£(ÎµÏ‰Ï‚); SB 16.12684,8-9 á½‘Ï€(á½²Ï) [á¼œ]Î¾Ï‰ Î¨ÎµÌ£á¿¦Ì£ÏÌ£ ÎºÎ±Ï„Ì£Î¿Î¯Ì£ÎºÌ£(Ï‰Î½))

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - This should be entered as <:(Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯Ï‰Î½))=PN U. Yiftach-Firanko|ed|(Î´Î·Î¼(Î¿ÏƒÎ¯á¿³)):>. Instead of writing "from comparation with other similar registers (suggestion by Uri Yiftach-Firanko)" => from comparison with other similar registers ** e.g. give some references here, so that editors can look at them to make a decision ** (suggestion by Uri Yiftach-Firanko). Thank you very much.
